verses.verse: For every <S%G3956><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> taken <S%G2983><s%> from among <S%G3319><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is ordained <S%G2525><s%> for men <S%G444><s%> in things pertaining to God, <S%G2316><s%> that he may offer <S%G4374><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> for sins: <S%G266><s%>

Who can <S%G1410><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> compassion <S%G3356><s%> on the ignorant, <S%G50><s%> and on them that are out of the way; <S%G4105><s%> for that he himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is compassed <S%G4029><s%> with infirmity. <S%G769><s%>

And by reason <S%G1223><s%> hereof <S%G5026><s%> he ought, <S%G3784><s%> as for the people, <S%G2992><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for himself, <S%G1438><s%> to offer <S%G4374><s%> for sins. <S%G266><s%>

And no <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> takes <S%G2983><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> but he that is called <S%G2564><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> as was Aaron. <S%G2><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> not himself <S%G1438><s%> to be made <S%G1096><s%> an high <S%G749><s%> priest; <S%G749><s%> but he that said <S%G2980><s%> to him, You are <S%G1488><s%> my Son, <S%G5207><s%> to day <S%G4594><s%> have I begotten <S%G1080><s%> you.

As he said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in another <S%G2087><s%> place, You are a priest <S%G2409><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchisedec. <S%G3198><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of his flesh, <S%G4561><s%> when he had offered <S%G4374><s%> up prayers <S%G1162><s%> and supplications <S%G2428><s%> with strong <S%G2478><s%> crying <S%G2906><s%> and tears <S%G1144><s%> to him that was able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> him from death, <S%G2288><s%> and was heard <S%G1522><s%> in that he feared; <S%G2124><s%>
Though <S%G2539><s%> he were a Son, <S%G5207><s%> yet learned <S%G3129><s%> he obedience <S%G5218><s%> by the things which <S%G3739><s%> he suffered; <S%G3958><s%>

And being made <S%G5048><s%> perfect, <S%G5048><s%> he became <S%G1096><s%> the author <S%G159><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> them that obey <S%G5219><s%> him;
Called <S%G4316><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> an high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchisedec. <S%G3198><s%>

Of whom <S%G3739><s%> we have many <S%G4183><s%> things to say, <S%G3056><s%> and hard <S%G1421><s%> to be uttered, <S%G3004><s%> seeing <S%G1893><s%> you are dull <S%G3576><s%> of hearing. <S%G189><s%>

For when for the time <S%G5550><s%> you ought <S%G3784><s%> to be teachers, <S%G1320><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> that one teach <S%G1321><s%> you again <S%G3825><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> be the first <S%G746><s%> principles <S%G4747><s%> of the oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and are become <S%G1096><s%> such as have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of milk, <S%G1051><s%> and not of strong <S%G4731><s%> meat. <S%G5160><s%>
For every <S%G3956><s%> one that uses <S%G3348><s%> milk <S%G1051><s%> is unskillful <S%G552><s%> in the word <S%G3056><s%> of righteousness: <S%G1343><s%> for he is a babe. <S%G3516><s%>

But strong <S%G4731><s%> meat <S%G5160><s%> belongs <S%G1510><s%> to them that are of full <S%G5046><s%> age, <S%G5046><s%> even those <S%G3588><s%> who by reason <S%G1223><s%> of use <S%G1838><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> their senses <S%G145><s%> exercised <S%G1128><s%> to discern <S%G1253><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> and evil. <S%G2556><s%>
